channel.title: Amazon S3 on Christoffer Nordenlöw
channel.description: Recent content in Amazon S3 on Christoffer Nordenlöw

item.title: Project: Shiny app for US Rates
item.description: The Shiny app created in this project monitors US Fixed Income market, focusing on Treasury Yields. The app will give a summary for some of the most important curves and indices on the US Treasury market as well as Breakeven Inflation expectations. Shiny app can be found here. Code available on github. Methodology Rates are parsed from US Treasury on a daily basis. However, the app will only parse the latest data once every day (of those days the app is used).
